unnormalised: Did you know that the NH44 is India's longest national highway, stretching approximately 3,745 km from Srinagar to Kanyakumari? Traveling by road gives you a real feel of the country. The Mumbai-Pune Expressway, officially NH48, is another marvel, reducing travel time significantly; it cost around Rs. 1630 crores to build. Remember to check toll rates and traffic updates before your trip. Also, always carry your DL and vehicle registration!
normalised: Did you know that the N-H forty four is India's longest national highway, stretching approximately three thousand seven hundred and forty five kilometer from Srinagar to Kanyakumari? Traveling by road gives you a real feel of the country. The Mumbai-Pune Expressway, officially N-H forty eight, is another marvel, reducing travel time significantly; it cost around rupee one thousand six hundred and thirty crore to build. Remember to check toll rates and traffic updates before your trip. Also, always carry your D-L and vehicle registration!
